name: A Collection Of Eyes
description:
Your journey through an unknowable space.

A Collection Of Eyes is a work in Unity3D WebGL. It is free to experience, and can be played in your browser full-window immediately here: https://ocias.com/games/acollectionofeyes/

Estimated play time: 1 minute.

A game by Alex Ocias using audio from freesound.org by DJGRIFFIN, Paddy Uglow and others. Built in Unity3D for WebGL.
